Uses of Class
goal.tools.mc.core.Controller

  • Packages that use Controller 
    Package Description
    goal.tools.mc.program.goal  
    goal.tools.mc.program.goal.prolog  

    • Uses of Controller in goal.tools.mc.program.goal

      Constructors in goal.tools.mc.program.goal with parameters of type Controller 
      Constructor and Description
      GOALProg(java.lang.String path, Formula f, Controller cont, boolean por)
      Constructs a GOALProg object according to the agent file at the specified path, given the formula under investigation, the controller that invokes this constructor, and a flag indicating whether partial order reduction should be applied.

    • Uses of Controller in goal.tools.mc.program.goal.prolog

      Constructors in goal.tools.mc.program.goal.prolog with parameters of type Controller 
      Constructor and Description
      GOALPrologProg(java.lang.String path, Formula negphi, Controller cont, boolean por)
      Constructs a GOALPrologProg object according to the agent file at the specified path, given the formula under investigation, the controller that invokes this constructor, and a flag indicating whether partial order reduction should be applied.
